pr_title: Custom message if can't recognize key in .dockstore.yml

timeline.message: if a key is unrecognized, create custom msg

timeline.bodyText: Could use a test, these string parse indexes feel breakable if the underlying library changes
timeline.author: denis-yuen

replies.bodyText: Agreed. This class has a fair amount of unit tests, which are easier and less cumbersome to deal with than integration tests (not dissing integration tests by any means). But with unit tests, you can easily and quickly feed in a variety of test cases. I suggest adding tests in there.
replies.author: coverbeck
